story:
About The Purpose Revolution

The Purpose Revolution is a movement, an accelerating purpose wave ripping through culture, government, healthcare and business, helping every human live a longer, healthier, more connected and abundant life.
After a very successful 2015, delivering FREE purpose discovery education to 1,200 people in over 50 countries, we need your help to bring this work to the entire species.  Please join us as a contributor to expedite the Revolution, helping us publish "The Purpose Revolution" Book and produce "The Science of Purpose" Video Series. 


With your contribution you will receive a host of great perks including:

  • The 21-Day Purpose Challenge, a LIVE online course that starts January 31, 2016, where you'll discover your purpose in a supportive community of purpose seekers.
  • "The Science of Purpose" e-book (below), revealing 30-pages of impressive research linking your life's purpose to a better body, career, relationship and planet!


About Purpose

Finding your PURPOSE is a scientifically proven best practice to create the life and planet you want.  In the last 35 years, scientists (ScienceOfPurpose.org) have proven that purpose empowers you and humanity to create better:

  1. HEALTH: Create a strong body and mind, living up to 7 years longer and 2x as likely to learn something new each day.
  2. CAREERS: Create a career of impact and abundance.  You are 4x more likely to be engaged at work and 50% more likely to be in a leadership role.
  3. LOVE: Create fulfilling relationships - a 31% increase in the experience of being loved.
  4. SOCIETY: Create a just, sustainable, tolerant and peaceful human presence on planet Earth; 50% increase in civic engagement.

Join the Purpose Revolution and become part of a 1 BILLION-strong global community, living a life of abundance, vitality and love.


Be a Part of Global Purpose Awakening!

Imagine what life would be like if you and every other human knew their life's purpose and created a purpose-driven livelihood!  The Purpose Revolution is a global movement, a world-wide community of people unlocking the scientifically-validated benefits of purpose in their life.  With your support, we will be able to inspire our whole species to find their purpose with a FREE purpose discovery tool-set and community.  We're doing this in 3 key ways:

  1. The Purpose Revolution Book - details the nature of purpose, the science of purpose, a clear path to finding your purpose, and how we can begin cooperating politically, economically and ecologically from a place of deep purpose awareness. (more details below)
  2. The Science of Purpose Video Series - a 5-part video series that explores purpose, a long-overlooked and scientifically-validated best practice, that radically improves your health, career, relationships, society, the economy and our relationship to Planet Earth. (more details below)
  3. The 21-Day Purpose Challenge - a FREE 3-week LIVE global challenge that starts on January 31st, where folks from all over the world will find their purpose together, support each other on the path, and accelerate the world-wide Purpose Revolution. (more details below) 


The Purpose Revolution Timeline


The 21-Day Purpose Challenge

Transformation and Activation Process

In August of 2015, this global family of participants completed one purpose discovery exercise a day for 21 days.  They shared their experience and supported each other in the Purpose Challengers Facebook group, gained greater clarity on their purpose, removed internal obstacles to them taking action on their purpose and created a way to live their purpose in the world, by building a team to execute their purpose projects in their local communities.


Of those who completed the post-Challenge feedback survey, 95% were more deeply connected to their purpose and said that they would recommend the Challenge to family members and friends.  (Read the testimonials below.)  Your support is needed to help us awaken our entire species to their life's purpose.


Going Global

We're excited to report that in 2016, The Purpose Revolution book will be translated into Spanish by Izabella Sepulveda, and the 21-Day Purpose Challenge will be delivered in Spanish by Oscar Medina.


Who We Are

January's Challenge will be delivered by a global team of Certified Challenge Leaders hailing from Romania, Aruba, Holland, the United States, Mexico and Canada!


The People Behind the Revolution

Why We Need a Purpose Revolution

Contrary to popular belief, politicians and business leaders do not lead, but rather follow the will of the people.  The extent to which our institutions remain purposeless, or working against the well-being of humanity, creating oppression, ecological destruction and an increasingly toxic planet, is driven, in large part, to humanity's disconnection from purpose.

A 2014 Gallup study revealed that 87% of humanity is not engaged at work, disconnected from their life's purpose to the tune of at least 40 hours a week.  87% of humanity is either doing the wrong job, or working in a powerful transformational capacity without giving their all.

It is no wonder that humanity has collectively driven itself to the brink of destruction, as recent reports from NASA, the UN/IPCC, as well as many for-profit interests (Grantham, PIMCO, Swiss Re and Shell Oil), have concluded that complex human society and industrialized capitalism will collapse in as little as 15 years, resulting in casualties of up to 80%.  That's 4 out of every 5 people you love.

Unfortunately, historical levers of change are no longer of use, as major democracies have become oligarchies, wherein the democratic process only represents those who can pay for influence via lobbyists.  As a 2015 Princeton study revealed, the United States is effectively an oligarchy.  We can't wait for politicians and legislators to save us this time; we need a new way to create the life and world we want.


How You Can Help

The task rests solely upon us as individual Earth citizens, to awaken ourselves, to recreate our entire lives with our life's purpose at the center, to overcome all the obstacles to living our purpose, to realize all the amazing benefits of living a life of purpose (a long life of vitality, abundance and love) and create communities and an economic system that will enable the continuance and flourishing of the human species.

The only thing in our way is cultural transformation - developing a deep connection to our life's purpose and cultivating the powerful skills required to live it and change the human condition - creating a just, sustainable and peaceful human presence on Planet Earth.

We need your help.  Your children and grandchildren need your help right now.  Please support the Purpose Revolution and help us get free purpose discovery education in the hands of every human being, in every language, in every corner of our home, Planet Earth.


What We Need & What You Get

To accelerate the Revolution, we need your help to get the book and video series completed.  With your financial support, we'll be able to get them completed and in your hands in early 2016.  Here is how we will spend your generous contribution:

  • Book proofing and editing: $4,000
  • Book and cover design, publishing and distribution via (Balboa Press / Hay House) on major book retailer sites (Amazon, Barnes and Noble): $1,000
  • Video production, to create a 5-video series on the Science of Purpose: $1,000
  • Indiegogo / Transaction Fees: $1,000
  • Perks: $1,000 (We're offering some great perks including purpose exercises (audio), "The Purpose Revolution" ebook, "The Purpose Revolution" softcover,  "Purpose Revolution" bracelet (above), exclusive first look access to the "Science of Purpose" video series, purpose coaching consultations, purpose workshops and keynote speeches for your organization or community on the power of purpose.
  • If we don't reach our goal, we will focus everything on the book, and postpone "The Science of Purpose" video series and marketing.
STRETCH GOAL: $50K

  • Translation: If we exceed our fundraising goal, we will invest your contribution in translating the Challenge into 30 languages, e.g. Mandarin, Hindi, Arabic, Portuguese, Bengali, Japanese, etc.: ($1,000 each)
  • Self-study Purpose Challenge: We will also make the Challenge available as a self-study web/mobile application: ($3,000).


"The Purpose Revolution" Book 

This book is divided into 3 parts, that take you deeper in the foundation, feeling and experience of finding and living your purpose.
  • Part One: Introduces the subject of purpose as a best practice for human life, and why it is needed for humanity to survive.  Sections: Prologue, Introduction Purpose 101, The Science of Purpose, The Five Ecstasies of Purpose.
  • Part Two: Contains the entire 21-Day Purpose Challenge, all the exercises, stories and teaching, and a link to join the Challenge live in community with other Purpose Challengers.
  • Part Three: Sets the global context for purpose awakening. Sections: My Path to Purpose, Purposeless Epidemic, Purpose Revolution, Declaration of Purpose, Purposeful Cosmos, Purposeful Economy, Purposeful Politics, Purposeful Culture, Conclusion.


"The Science of Purpose" Videos

  • Video One HEALTH: Defines purpose, and explores the science behind purpose creating a better body and mind.
  • Video Two CAREER: Explores the science behind purpose creating a more fulfilling and abundant career.
  • Video Three LOVE: Explores the science behind purpose creating authentic romantic relationships.
  • Video Four SOCIETY: Explores the science behind purpose creating a kind, tolerant, curious and connected society, and a sustainable economy.
  • Video Five DISCOVERY: Explores the science behind the path to finding your purpose.
Much of the above content can be found in the VIDEO (below), beginning at 5 minutes in.


The 21-Day Purpose Challenge Testimonials

“I would recommend doing the 21-Day Purpose Challenge to anyone. It is the most important course I have ever done. Not only have I found a new lust for life, I also learned some basic truths about myself. I now know that, if in doubt, I have to consult my various personas to remove any hesitancy. This course taught me newfound respect for myself and also the people that I encounter, and will meet in the future.” Paul Z.

“I recommend this program to any person who wants to find their purpose in life. This is the best thing that has ever happened to me.  Until today I was not really sure of what I wanted, but now I know so much about myself I can't ever get lost again. The support I got from the Facebook group was very useful, it made me feel comfortable and that I was not alone in this journey. I thank Brandon and the team for everything they did!” Izabella S.

“This 21-Day Purpose Challenge program is very thorough, with many explanations, tools and presentations and is the best way to achieve a specific life purpose for the individual that I have come across in my 92 years of life. I had participated previously with two teachers on the subject of life purpose and so I can evaluate what a wonderful instructive program is presented here.” Marlyse K.

“I have spent 64 years trying to ‘figure it out’ and Brandon helped me cut to the chase in 21 days!” Cheri A.

“My emotions varied from delight and joy to sadness, tears, frustration and even anger, but at the end of the purpose challenge, I have found a deeper understanding of myself and how I want to relate with the world.” Trevor N.

“I can't comment enough on Brandon's daily words of wisdom - almost every time, he would touch some parts of my consciousness, its nerve -seamlessly guessing, correctly, the very things that are bearing on my mind... what this world is really missing is its purpose, being declared loudly, followed relentlessly... before it's too late.” Vladimir V.


Risks & Challenges

Nothing worth doing comes easy, and the Purpose Revolution is no different.  Collectively, we've invested at least 2,000 hours into researching and writing "The Purpose Revolution" book and crafting the Science of Purpose video series.  Both are on track to be in your hands in early 2016.  However, the last 5% is what is the most difficult, and what makes a good book and video great.  Although we are on track for early 2016 release dates, we recognize that this is a complex process with many moving parts and it may indeed take longer than that.

Quality is job one, as we believe the future of our species relies on both the book and video series being great.  If we determine we need to extend the deadline a few weeks or months, to add necessary incremental value to the project, we will do that.

I'm confident we'll overcome any challenges we encounter together, as we are a team of seasoned experts, activists and writers, who have published books in the past and love working together.  What I can absolutely guarantee you is that we'll be in communication with you all the way, and let you know how the project is developing.


Other Ways You Can Help

  • In case you are unable to support us, please help us get the word out and make a loud noise about the importance of the Purpose Revolution.
  • Connect us with your friends in the media so we can continue the acceleration!
Learn more about the Revolution and the 21-Day Purpose Challenge here: 
  • http://planetpurpose.org
  • http://scienceofpurpose.org
Stay on top of the global purpose conversation here:

  • Facebook
  • Twitter #lifeofpurpose
Check out this video on the Power of Purpose in Business and the slides below...

story:
Tavern Books is a non-profit publishing house dedicated to reviving poetry collections that have fallen out of print and publishing poetry in translation from around the world. Since 2009, we have published work by overlooked masters like Eunice Odio and Adrian C. Louis alongside Nobel Laureates like Tomas Tranströmer and Nelly Sachs. We keep every title in our catalog, known as The Living Library, in print in perpetuity.


About This Project

Next spring, Tavern Books will publish Anna Świrszczyńska's Building the Barricade in a bilingual edition, translated from the Polish by Piotr Florczyk. This cycle of 101 poems, which delivers poignant, indelible lyric dispatches from within the 1944 Warsaw Uprising, was first published in Poland in 1974 and has never before been available in its entirety to a North American audience.

Building the Barricade offers a firsthand, documentary account — in verse — of the World War II operation staged by the Polish resistance Home Army to liberate Warsaw from Nazi Germany. It contains the unique perspective of an individual who was both a participant in the resistance movement and a respected poet by trade. Thirty years after the 63-day uprising, Świrszczyńska, who worked as a nurse within the barricade, felt compelled to write a testimony that functions simultaneously as memoir, journalistic report, and high art. In a style marked by objectivity, empathy, immediacy, and introspection, Świrszczyńska evokes memories of the suffering and atrocities that unfolded across the city.

This is a book that Tavern Books has long dreamed of publishing and making available to a wide reading public in an English translation. This year, we acquired permission from the Świrszczyńska estate to pursue this project and enlisted Piotr Florczyk to translate the book in its entirety. This edition will feature an introduction by award-winning poet Eavan Boland. Like all our titles, Building the Barricade will be released in hardcover and paperback editions.

We need your help to bring these essential poems of witness to an English-speaking audience in an exquisite translation. Join us in giving Świrszczyńska's voice a permanent home.


How You Can Help
Your contribution of any size will help us produce this vital work of art and history, as well as place it into the hands of readers and onto the shelves of institutions, libraries, bookstores, and classrooms nationwide. Every dollar counts; whether you can give $30 or $3,000, you will be investing in a literary landmark. In return for your generosity and vision, we are excited to offer an array of gifts to funders of this campaign. Check out our incentives at the right of the page.

Our goal is to raise $10,000 in order to publish, promote, and distribute a beautiful book.


About the Book

Building the Barricade by Anna Świrszczyńska, translated from the Polish by Piotr Florczyk. Introduction by Eavan Boland. Cover art: "Bee 33" by Rebecca Clark. Graphite on paper.

ISBN-13: 978-1-935635-57-4 (pb) / ISBN-13: 978-1-935635-58-1 (hc) / 230 pages / Available March 2016 / Distributor: Small Press Distribution / 5.5 x 7.5"


Our Track Record and Your Impact

Tavern Books has been publishing since 2009, and during that time we've worked with numerous estates, archives, copyright holders, and universities to realize our editorial vision. To date, we've published 36 titles from 12 languages under the auspices of state funders, private foundations, and national granting agencies, including the Lannan Foundation and the National Endowment for the Arts. We work closely with our living authors and translators at every step of production. Building the Barricade is a title that has been on the radar for a long time.

We are reaching out to the public to engage our readers with the production of this book and to allow us to have an even stronger audience impact.

What does your gift mean? On a practical level, the funds raised through this campaign will offset printing costs, translator fees, book design, editing, acquisition, and distribution.

But at another level, the magnitude of your donation is unquantifiable; Building the Barricade is a tangible monument to remembering and to empathy, a summons to recall the humanity that persists in the face of suffering. Your funds will go toward preserving a moment in history that is, like all historical experiences, susceptible to being forgotten.

And, of course, your donation will fuel the overarching mission and philosophy of Tavern Books, which is to preserve printed books and book culture.


Risks and Challenges

Tavern Books is a non-profit with very little overhead. We do a substantial amount of work with a modest budget and a small infrastructure (there are just two of us!). That means that your donation has a great deal of mileage in terms of making the actual book.

We rely on the generosity of readers and book lovers to bring our projects to fruition. Only about 30% of our revenue derives from book sales; the rest comes from grants, donations, and corporate sponsors. As with any book we publish, we must rely on a variety of funding sources to carry out this project. Building the Barricade is a particularly financially challenging book to publish, due to the high cost of acquiring rights.

Your trust and support allows us to continue seeking out great work and publishing high-quality, lasting editions.


Other Ways You Can Help
Not in a position to donate? Please know that word of mouth is instrumental to raising awareness and funding. Each person who shares this message will contribute greatly to the making of Building the Barricade.

Help us get the word out! Share this link and talk to other readers about this project.


About the Author
Anna Świrszczyńska was born in Warsaw, Poland, in 1909. She attended Warsaw University where she studied medieval and baroque Polish literature, and published eight books of poetry. In 1974, she published Building the Barricade, a volume which describes the suffering she witnessed and experienced during the Warsaw Uprising of August 1, 1944. She often said and wrote: “War made me another person.” Świrszczyńska died in Warsaw of cancer in 1984.


About the Translator
Piotr Florczyk is a poet, essayist, and translator of six volumes of Polish poetry.  A native of Poland, Florczyk is a fellow at the Czesław Miłosz Institute at Claremont McKenna College. He has taught poetry and literature at the University of San Diego, Antioch University in Los Angeles, and the University of Delaware. He currently lives in Los Angeles.


Our Mission
Tavern Books is a 501(c)(3) not-for-profit poetry publisher based in Portland, Oregon. We exist to print, promote, and preserve works of literary vision, to foster a climate of cultural preservation, and to disseminate books in a way that benefits the reading public.

atrocities that unfolded across the city.This is a book that Tavern Books has long dreamed of publishing and making available to a wide reading public in an English translation. This year, we acquired permission from the Świrszczyńska estate to pursue this project and enlisted Piotr Florczyk to translate the book in its entirety. This edition will feature an introduction by award-winning poet Eavan Boland. Like all our titles, Building the Barricade will be released in hardcover and paperback editions.We need your help to bring these essential poems of witness to an English-speaking audience in an exquisite translation. Join us in giving Świrszczyńska's voice a permanent home.
How You Can HelpYour contribution of any size will help us produce this vital work of
art and history, as well as place it into the hands of readers and onto the shelves of
institutions, libraries, bookstores, and classrooms nationwide. Every dollar counts; whether you can give $30 or
$3,000, you will be investing in a literary
landmark.
In return for your generosity and vision, we are excited to offer an 
array of gifts to funders of this campaign. Check out our incentives at the right of the page.Our goal is to raise $10,000 in order to publish, promote, and distribute a beautiful book.About the BookBuilding the Barricade by Anna Świrszczyńska, translated from the Polish by Piotr Florczyk. Introduction by Eavan Boland. Cover art: "Bee 33" by Rebecca Clark. Graphite on paper.ISBN-13: 978-1-935635-57-4 (pb) / ISBN-13: 978-1-935635-58-1 (hc) / 230 pages / Available March 2016 / Distributor: Small Press Distribution / 5.5 x 7.5"Our Track Record and Your Impact
Tavern Books has been publishing since 2009, and during
that time we've worked with numerous estates, archives, copyright holders, and
universities to realize our editorial vision. To date, we've published 36 titles from 12 languages under the auspices of state funders, private foundations, and national granting agencies, including the Lannan
Foundation and the National Endowment for the Arts. We work closely with our living authors and translators at every step of production. Building the Barricade is a title that has been on the radar for a long time.We are reaching out to the public to engage our readers with
the production of this book and to allow us to have an even stronger
audience impact.What does your gift mean? On a practical level,
the funds raised through this campaign will offset printing costs,
translator fees, book design, editing, acquisition, and distribution. But at another level, the magnitude of your donation is unquantifiable; Building the Barricade is a tangible monument to
remembering and to empathy, a summons to recall the humanity that 
persists in the face of suffering. Your funds 
will go toward preserving
a moment in history that is, like all historical experiences, 
susceptible to being
forgotten.And, of course, your donation will fuel the overarching mission and philosophy of 
Tavern Books, which is to preserve printed books and book culture. 




Risks and Challenges
Tavern Books is a non-profit with very little overhead. We do a substantial amount of work with a modest budget and a small infrastructure (there are just two of us!). That means that your donation has a great deal of mileage in terms of making the actual book. We rely on the generosity of
readers and book lovers to bring our projects to fruition. Only about 30% of our revenue derives from book sales; the rest comes from grants, donations, and corporate sponsors. As with any book we publish, we must rely on a variety of funding sources to carry out this project. Building the Barricade is a particularly financially challenging book to publish, due to the high cost of acquiring rights.Your trust and support allows us to continue seeking out great work and publishing high-quality, lasting editions.
Other Ways You Can HelpNot in a position to donate? Please know that word of mouth is instrumental to raising awareness and funding. Each person who shares this message will contribute greatly to the making of Building the Barricade. Help us get the word out! Share this link and talk to other readers about this project.About the AuthorAnna Świrszczyńska was born in Warsaw, Poland, in
1909. She attended Warsaw University where she studied medieval and
baroque Polish literature, and published eight books of poetry. In 1974, she published Building the Barricade,
a volume which describes the suffering she witnessed and experienced
during the Warsaw Uprising of August 1, 1944. She often
said and wrote: “War made me another person.” Świrszczyńska
died in Warsaw of cancer in 1984.
About the TranslatorPiotr Florczyk is a poet, essayist, and translator of
six volumes of Polish poetry.  A native of Poland, Florczyk is a
fellow at the Czesław Miłosz Institute at Claremont McKenna
College. He has taught poetry and literature at the University of San
Diego, Antioch University in Los Angeles, and the University of
Delaware. He currently lives in Los Angeles.
Our MissionTavern Books is a 501(c)(3) not-for-profit poetry publisher based in Portland, Oregon. We exist to print, promote, and preserve works of literary vision, to foster a climate of cultural preservation, and to disseminate books in a way that benefits the reading public.

story:
Why this project matters

    • By supporting this project, you are actively contributing to keep raising awareness about the risks that journalists face while doing their jobs.

    • Mexico is one of the most dangerous countries in the world for journalists. From 2000 to 2015, According to the NGO 'Article 19', 82 journalists in Mexico have been killed. I personally met/worked with six of them. 

    •


    • My name is Luis Nájera; I am a Mexican journalist with 20 years of professional experience, currently living with my family as refugees in Canada. In recognition of my career at the US-Mexico border, In 2010 I received the CJFE International Press Freedom Award; in 2011, one of the Human Rights Watch’s Hellman /Hammett awards, and since 2011, I am affiliated to the prestigious Massey College in the University of Toronto.

    My campaign aims to raising funds to support me and my family while going through the process of completing my book, which is a compilation of the stories I wrote, and photos I took, all over both sides of the US-Mexico border, from 2004 to 2008.

    This project intends to provide first-hand information and images about a dynamic, complex and conflicted region as the US-Mexico is, looking to give the reader a better understanding of what has been called ‘the third country’. Most of the literature available on the region about the ‘war on drugs’ at the border has been written by outsiders without the vision of living and working at the same place where those important events happened. 

    My goal is to raise $10,000 CAD that would allow me to cover living expenses for three months for me, my wife, my two sons, and my daughter. Those three months are an estimated time to conducting additional research, curating articles and photos, and writing chapter introductions. Printing costs will be covered by the academic Institution. 

    It is important to clarify that this is a project developing only in Spanish, and it will be published by my alma mater, the Autonomous University of Nuevo Leon. Because this is a public institution in a developing country, there are no funds available for its writers. Therefore, there is a need for resources to pay my bills while completing the creative process. However, as soon as the book is finished, eventually an English edition may be printed.

    Once the writing begins, I'll keep you updated every week through my personal blog http://borderfrontera.tumblr.com/

    • How can you help 

    Please donate. 1, 2 or more dollars make a difference. If you are unable to donate, don’t worry! You still can make a difference by sharing this project among your peers, friends or colleagues. 

     Please spread the word!

    Thank you! Gracias! Merci!

story:
The Story

My name is Sonia Hidalgo Z, I am an architect. I have realized the basic plans for the future temple in Jerusalem, previously to this work, I have deciphered every verse of the Prophet Ezekiel's book. Once the basic project was finished, I dedicated myself to prepare digital 3D versions of it. The software I work with is good enough, but I need a more realistic render of the project.

Mi nombre es Sonia Hidalgo Z, soy arquitecta.  He realizado los planos para el futuro templo o Beit Hamikdash en Jerusalén.

Para continuar con el trabajo de investigación, estudio y ejecución del proyecto del templo, necesito dinero para comprar programas mas sofisticados, una impresora 3d, además necesito traductores con mínimo 3 idiomas: inglés, hebreo y español para traducir el libro técnico sobre el templo que he escrito.


What I need and what you obtain

To continue with the investigative work, the study and execution of the temple project, I need money to buy more sophisticated software, a 3D printer, a presentational video and a more realistic render of the project. I also need translations into 3 languages: English, Hebrew and Spanish to compare the texts with the plans I made and to edit and publish the book about the description of the temple with technical commentary, images, plans and measurements.

Money is needed for advertising and the spreading of the project.

It is also expected to do a scale model of the entire project. To that end, a team with people specialized in miniature architectural modeling is needed and I would also like to form a non-profit association or associate with an already existing institution to be able to officially act as “constructors of the temple”

What you gain:

1.- There are many prices, you chose which one you like the most

2.- With my work you can achieve a comprehension of the description of the temple, which until now had been very difficult to understand.

3.- All donors will be inscribed in the book as active participants of this great project.

4.- World wide reaching bonds of friendship uniting people in one common cause

5.- Taking part of a cultural work and the learning of the architectural part of the temple


Lo que necesito y lo que obtienes

Los planos están casi terminados y necesito hacer un buen vídeo y un render  mas realista del proyecto. Necesito dinero para publicidad, difundir el proyecto, publicar el libro con comentarios, medidas y planos del templo de Ezequiel.

Está además previsto hacer una maqueta de todo el proyecto, para ello se necesita formar un buen equipo con personas especializadas en modelos de arquitectura además me gustaría formar una asociación sin ánimos de lucro o asociarme con alguna institución ya existente para poder actuar oficialmente como “Constructores del Templo”.

Las personas obtienen:

1.- El conocimiento de la descripción del templo.

2.- La descripción del templo que hasta hoy había sido difícil de entender y que gracias a las nuevas tecnologías será accesible al entendimiento de todo el mundo.

3.- El orgullo de haber participado en un proyecto milenial.

4.- Generar lazos de amistad a nivel mundial uniéndonos en una causa.


The impact and the why of this campaign

1.- More than 2000 years have passed since the prophecy of the future temple in Jerusalem was written. A prophecy very difficult to understand up until now, there are very few works that strictly follow the description of the temple according to the prophet Ezekiel.

2.- Institutions and associations should unite to attain the achievement of the study of the temple, first at an educational level and later on a fisical level with the construction of the temple.

3.- My project is almost finished and if all the people that made similar studies would unite, we would soon come to a conclusion. I think we should invite all scholars in the topic to participate in the project, it is not about competition, but about uniting goals and efforts.

4.- I have at my disposition graphic material: pictures, 3D renders and presentations to instruct young architects that would be interested in the topic, furthermore I thought of joining an association or institution to cooperate and interact together.

5.- The plans I created follow strictly the description of the temple acording to Ezekiel, verse after verse and they also obey all the necessary aspects for the correct operation of the temple: doors, land levels, vertical and horizontal communications (staircases and elevators), bathrooms, dining rooms, storage rooms, reception desks, water fountains, etc...

6.- My idea is that the more we are occupied in the study and the learning of the temple, the faster we will achieve the conclusion of the project. For now only on an educational and informative level.

El impacto y el por que de esta campana

1.- Han pasado mas de dos mil anos que se escribió la profecía del templo futuro en Jerusalén, profecía muy difícil de entender hasta la fecha, hay muy pocos trabajos que se rigen estrictamente a la descripción del templo según el profeta Ezequiel.

2.- Según mis cálculos un equipo de 5 arquitectos, podría tardar unos 12 años en conseguir descifrar a Ezequiel y en confeccionar los planos, sin embargo, mi proyecto esta casi completo y es de gran interés para todos los que creen en la profecía y en la llegada del Mesías.

3.- Cuento con material gráfico: imágenes, 3 d y presentaciones, para instruir a jóvenes arquitectos que estén interesados en el tema, además he pensado que podría unirme con alguna asociación o instituto para colaborar e interactuar conjuntamente, pero por lo pronto me encuentro sola en este barco.

4.- Mis planos se rigen estrictamente a la descripción del templo según Ezequiel, verso a verso y además cumplen con todos los aspectos necesarios para el buen funcionamiento del templo: puertas, niveles de terreno, comunicación vertical y horizontal (escaleras, ascensores), baños, comedores, lugar para guardar cosas, recepciones, fuentes de agua, etc...

5.- Mi idea es que mientras mas personas estemos ocupadas en estudiar y aprender sobre el templo, mas rápido conseguiremos realizar el proyecto.  Por ahora solo a nivel educativo e informativo.



Risks and challenges

I think: no risk, no challenge.

The first risk would be not doing anything and remain inert, the challenge is to continue with this project no matter what, until the goal is reached.

The second risk would be not achieving the stipulated goal, however the author of this project will continue with the work regardless and commits to deliver the prices to the people that request them.

Riesgos y desafíos

Estoy consciente de que hay mucha polémica en este asunto, sin embargo creo que es un proyecto de interés mundial.  Soy una persona neutral, no tengo nada en contra de ninguna religión y pienso que se podría convivir en armonía sin hacer la guerra entre creencias y religiones buscando compromisos de amistad y solidaridad. Si alguien me pregunta por que justamente mi persona ha realizado este proyecto, contestaré: por qué no? He trabajado contra viento y marea durante dos anos, quizá el tiempo mas difícil de mi vida ya que me ha tocado pasar por grandes sufrimientos, pero eso ya no es importante.

Other forms in which you can help

If you cannot cooperate on an economical level, you can still do it the following way:

  • Spread the word about this campaign to expand it on a global level.

  • Tell all your friends and relatives on social media and invite them to take part.

Thank you very much for your contribution!!!


Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

Si no puedes colaborar económicamente puedes hacerlo de la siguiente manera:

  •  Difundir esta campaña para generar eco.
  • Avisar a tus amigos en las redes sociales, invitarlos a colaborar
  • Hay que usar las herramientas para compartir de Indiegogo.

Gracias por ayudar!!!

story:
> Nederlandstalige versie hieronder

GREVES: LES CITOYENS-OTAGES

Service minimum dans les transports publics, piquets de grève, grèves sauvages : demandons aux autorités publiques de clarifier.

Dans une démocratie, il faut pouvoir manifester son éventuelle désapprobation face à l’attitude des patrons ou des gouvernants. Mais les droits des uns ne peuvent pas être exercés en prenant en otage les autres. Nous voulons réagir contre la nonchalance des autorités qui laissent faire les abus.

La première étape de notre projet est déjà exécutée : nous avons fait un sondage de la population belge sur la question du service minimum en cas de grève, et nous avons fait une enquête auprès des 4 ministres des transports publics pour connaître leurs intentions. Le sondage est bon marché parce qu’il exploite les données du GPS électoral, où 18.630 répondants ont fourni l’information nécessaire pour pondérer l’échantillon. L’article est sur notre site. Il est répercuté dans le journal Metro du 10 février (tirage de 225.000 exemplaires), notre newsletter (plus de 30.000 destinataires), et la presse en général.

La deuxième étape consiste en un sondage des acteurs politiques : examen des initiatives parlementaires, interrogation de l’ensemble des 484 parlementaires, des partis et des syndicats, recherche des prises de position dans la presse. Le résultat de ces recherches sera intégré dans le Répertoire Politique de façon à le rendre aisément consultable.


La troisième étape est une enquête sur la question des piquets de grève : analyse de la jurisprudence, interrogation des ministres compétents. Ensuite un article sera diffusé de façon comparable à l’étape 1.

La quatrième étape consistant en un colloque se fera, si possible, en partenariat avec un thinktank déjà actif en Belgique, ou avec une université.

La cinquième étape est une carte-blanche à publier dans la presse. Le but est de réunir la signature d’au moins 40 personnalités, essentiellement des professeurs d’université. Le texte devrait inciter le législateur à clarifier les droits et les devoirs relatifs à la grève.

La sixième étape serait une enquête (i) sur les sanctions appliquées (ou à l’examen) contre les abus en matière de grèves, et (ii) sur les projets règlementaires de service minimum.

A QUOI SERVIRA LA COLLECTE?

Les fonds levés (à hauteur de € 2.900) permettront de réaliser la deuxième étape: le sondage des acteurs politiques.

a) Examen des initiatives parlementaires : recherche dans les archives des parlements fédéral et régionaux ; s’il y a eu vote d’une loi, on copie les votes nominatifs ; s’il y a eu dépôt de propositions de loi, on note qui ont pris l’initiative.
b) Interrogation de l’ensemble des 438 parlementaires : via email, avec un rappel.
c) Interrogation des partis et des syndicats : via email + rappel téléphonique.
d) Recherche des prises de position dans la presse : recherche sur Google.
e) Le résultat de ces recherches sera intégré dans le Répertoire Politique de façon à le rendre aisément consultable par le grand public.
f) Publication d’un rapport d’analyse des résultats.

Si nous récoltons plus que € 2.900, nous les allouerons le surplus aux phases suivantes:
Étape 3: avril - article 2: piquets de grève - 1.500€
Étape 4: juin - colloque - 5.000€
Étape 5: sept - carte-blanche signée par 40 acteurs importants - 2.000€
Étape 6: octobre - article 3 (follow-up): service minimum dans les transport publics, grèves sauvages - 1.500€

QUI SUIS-JE?

Comme vous, je suis un électeur et j’essaie d’être un citoyen responsable. Je me réjouis qu’on puisse accorder des votes de préférence à des candidats individuels. Mais je suis perplexe lors des élections : comment trouver, parmi les milliers de candidats, ceux en qui je puisse me reconnaître ?

Faute d’offre adéquate sur le ‘marché’ de l’information, j’ai mobilisé d’autres défenseurs de la démocratie et nous avons démarré l’association WeCitizens (NousCitoyens), à ne pas confondre avec le parti français Nous_Citoyens! WeCitizens, association sans but lucratif (asbl), porteur du présent projet, est un ‘test-achats’ de l’électeur, une ‘wikipedia’ des politiciens, un institut d'éducation citoyenne, un observatoire de la gestion publique.

En tant qu’ingénieur civil, je n’étais pas prédestiné à m’occuper de politique, mais bien à offrir des solutions à grande valeur ajoutée. Antérieurement je me suis occupé de coopération au développement et d’autres initiatives visant à intérêt sociétal. (Ce qui me laissait peu de temps pour pratiquer du VTT…)

Durant sept ans j’ai été directeur à la CREG, l'autorité fédérale belge de régulation du marché de l'énergie, ce qui m’a familiarisé avec le fonctionnement des pouvoir publics.

En mai 2014, lors des élections, NousCitoyens a mis en ligne une première version de son application RepertoirePolitique où près de 5000 acteurs politiques belges sont répertoriés. Parmi ceux-ci, 1500 candidats aux élections de mai 2014 ont collaboré en remplissant un questionnaire politique (pour le GPS électoral). Nos projets sont validés par un comité scientifique composé de professeurs d’université et de journalistes. Tous les partis politiques désignent une personne-relais pour veiller à une bonne communication entre le parti et NousCitoyens.

 

STAKINGEN: DE BURGERS-GIJZELAARS

Minimumdienst bij het openbaar vervoer, stakingsposten, wilde stakingen : duidelijkheid vragen aan de overheid.

In een democratie moet mogelijke afkeuring kunnen worden getoond tegenover de houding van de meerderen of regeringsleiders. Rechten doen gelden door er andere voor te gijzelen, is echter niet mogelijk. Wij willen reageren tegen de achteloosheid van de autoriteiten die het misbruik laten voortduren.

De eerste fase van het project is reeds uitgevoerd : we hebben een peiling onder de Belgische bevolking gehouden waarin we vroegen naar de minimumdienst in geval van staking. Daarnaast hebben we een rondvraag bij 4 ministers van het openbaar vervoer gedaan om naar hun standpunten te polsen. De peiling is goedkoop omdat ze gebruik maakt van de gegevens in de kieswijzer, waarin 18.630 respondenten de nodige informatie hebben geleverd om het monster in balans te houden. Het artikel staat op onze website. Het zal ook worden verspreid via de krant Metro (10 februari, oplage 225.000 exemplaren), onze nieuwsbrief (meer dan 30.000 ontvangers) en de pers in het algemeen.   

De tweede fase omvat een peiling onder de politieke actoren : onderzoek naar de parlementaire initiatieven, ondervraging van alle 484 parlementsleden, de partijen en de vakbonden, inspectie op stellingnamen in de pers. Het resultaat van dat onderzoek zal in de Politieke Databank worden geïntegreerd zodat het gemakkelijk te raad


De derde fase is een onderzoek naar de vraag van de stakingsposten: analyse van de rechtspraak, ondervraging van de bevoegde ministers. Vervolgens zal er een artikel worden verspreid op een manier die vergelijkbaar is met de 1ste fase.

De vierde fase bestaat uit een symposium, dat, indien mogelijk, zal worden gehouden in samenwerking met een reeds in België actieve denktank of met een universiteit.

De vijfde stap is de publicatie van een volmacht in de pers. Het doel is om de handtekeningen van minstens 40 persoonlijkheden uit vooral de universitaire kringen bijeen te krijgen. De tekst zou de wetgever moeten aanmoedigen om de stakingsrechten en –plichten te verduidelijken.  

De zesde stap zou een onderzoek (i) met betrekking tot de opgelegde (of onderzochte) sancties inhouden tegen het misbruik inzake stakingen en (ii) met betrekking tot de reglementaire projecten voor een minimale dienstverlening.

WAAR DIENT DE INZAMELING VOOR?

De fondsen die we verzamelen zullen (ter hoogte van € 2.900) dienen voor de tweede fase van ons project (gedurende de maand maart):

a) Onderzoek van de parlementaire initiatieven: opzoeking in de archieven van federale en regionale parlementen; als een wet gestemd werd, kopiëren we het stemgedrag van de parlementsleden; als wetsvoorstellen zijn ingediend, dan noteren wie de initiatiefnemers zijn.
b) Ondervraging van alle 438 parlementsleden: via e-mail, met een herinnering.
c) Ondervraging van de partijen en vakbonden: via e-mail + telefoontje.
d) via Google zoeken we naar de relevante figuren die zich over dit onderwerp hebben uitgesproken.
e) De resultaten van dit onderzoek zullen worden geïntegreerd in de Politieke Databank, zodat het grote publiek daar gemakkelijk kennis van kan nemen.
f) Publicatie van een artikel met de analyseresultaten.

Als we meer dan € 2900 verzamelen, zullen we het overschot gebruiken voor de volgende fasen van het project:
Stap 3 : april - artikel (2) over de stakingspikette - 1.500
Stap 4 : juni - Seminarie over de stakingswetgeving - 5.000
Stap 5 : sept. - open brief, getekend door 40 personaliteiten - 2.000
Stap 6 : oktober - artikel (3), follow-up: minimum dienst in het openbaar vervoer, wilde stakingen - 1.500

WIE BEN IK?

Net als jij probeer ik een verantwoordelijke burger te zijn. Ik vrees dat sommige (politieke, sociale, industriële) autoriteiten hun persoonlijke belangen begunstigen ten nadele van het collectieve belang. Het feit dat politici recht hebben op een formele legitimiteit, waarborgt niet dat zij onze gemeenschappelijke belangen op bevredigende wijze behartigen.

Om de burgercontrole over de uitoefening van de macht op te schroeven, heb ik andere verdedigers van de democratie opgetrommeld. Wij hebben de vereniging WeCitizens (WijBurgers) opgestart, die niet mag worden verward met de Franse Partij Nous Citoyens !

WeCitizens, vereniging zonder winstoogmerk (vzw), drager van het huidige project, is een “Test-Aankoop” van de kiezer, een “Wikipedia” van politici, een educatief centrum voor de burger, een observatorium voor het openbaar bestuur.

Als burgerlijk ingenieur was ik niet voorbestemd om me met politiek bezig te houden, maar wel om oplossingen met een hoge toegevoegde waarde te bieden. Eerder was ik betrokken bij ontwikkelingssamenwerking en bij andere initiatieven van maatschappelijk belang (wat me weinig tijd overliet voor mijn hobby; mountainbiken…).

Zeven jaar lang was ik directeur aan de CREG, de Belgische, federale instantie voor de regulering van de elektriciteitsmarkt. Dat heeft me vertrouwd gemaakt met de werking van het openbaar bestuur.

In mei 2014, ten tijde van de verkiezingen, heeft WijBurgers een eerste versie van haar toepassing directory.wecitizens online gezet, waarin ongeveer 5000 Belgische politieke actoren opgenomen zijn. Van hen hebben 150 kandidaten voor de verkiezingen van mei 2014 samengewerkt door een politieke vragenlijst in te vullen (voor de kieswijzer). Onze projecten worden bekrachtigd door een wetenschappelijk comité bestaande uit hoogleraren en journalisten. Iedere politieke partij benoemt een referentiepersoon die instaat voor een goede communicatie tussen de partij en WijBurgers.

> Nederlandstalige versie hieronderGREVES: LES CITOYENS-OTAGESService minimum dans les transports publics, piquets de grève, grèves sauvages : demandons aux autorités publiques de clarifier.Dans une démocratie, il faut pouvoir manifester son éventuelle 
désapprobation face à l’attitude des patrons ou des gouvernants. Mais 
les droits des uns ne peuvent pas être exercés en prenant en otage les 
autres. Nous voulons réagir contre la nonchalance des autorités qui 
laissent faire les abus.La première étape de notre projet est déjà exécutée :
 nous avons fait un sondage de la population belge sur la question du 
service minimum en cas de grève, et nous avons fait une enquête auprès 
des 4 ministres des transports publics pour connaître leurs intentions. 
Le sondage est bon marché parce qu’il exploite les données du GPS 
électoral, où 18.630 répondants ont fourni l’information nécessaire pour
 pondérer l’échantillon. L’article est sur notre site. Il est répercuté dans le journal Metro du 10 février (tirage 
de 225.000 exemplaires), notre newsletter (plus de 30.000 
destinataires), et la presse en général.La deuxième étape
 consiste en un sondage des acteurs politiques : examen des 
initiatives parlementaires, interrogation de l’ensemble des 484 
parlementaires, des partis et des syndicats, recherche des prises de 
position dans la presse. Le résultat de ces recherches sera intégré dans
 le Répertoire Politique de façon à le rendre aisément consultable.
La troisième étape
 est une enquête sur la question des piquets de grève : analyse de la 
jurisprudence, interrogation des ministres compétents. Ensuite un 
article sera diffusé de façon comparable à l’étape 1.La quatrième étape
 consistant en un colloque se fera, si possible, en partenariat avec un 
thinktank déjà actif en Belgique, ou avec une université.La cinquième étape est une carte-blanche à publier dans la presse. Le but est de réunir la signature d’au moins 40 personnalités, essentiellement des professeurs d’université. Le texte devrait inciter le législateur à clarifier les 
droits et les devoirs relatifs à la grève.La sixième étape
 serait une enquête (i) sur les sanctions appliquées (ou à l’examen) 
contre les abus en matière de grèves, et (ii) sur les projets 
règlementaires de service minimum.


A QUOI SERVIRA LA COLLECTE?Les fonds levés (à hauteur de € 2.900) permettront de réaliser la deuxième étape: le sondage des acteurs politiques.
a) Examen des initiatives parlementaires : recherche dans les archives des 
parlements fédéral et régionaux ; s’il y a eu vote d’une loi, on copie 
les votes nominatifs ; s’il y a eu dépôt de propositions de loi, on note
 qui ont pris l’initiative.
b) Interrogation de l’ensemble des 438 parlementaires : via email, avec un rappel.
c) Interrogation des partis et des syndicats : via email + rappel téléphonique.
d) Recherche des prises de position dans la presse : recherche sur Google.
e) Le résultat de ces recherches sera intégré dans le Répertoire Politique de façon à le rendre aisément consultable par le grand public.
f) Publication d’un rapport d’analyse des résultats.Si nous récoltons plus que € 2.900, nous les allouerons le surplus aux phases suivantes:Étape 3: avril - article 2: piquets de grève - 1.500€Étape 4: juin - colloque - 5.000€Étape 5: sept - carte-blanche signée par 40 acteurs importants - 2.000€Étape 6: octobre - article 3 (follow-up): service minimum dans les transport publics, grèves sauvages - 1.500€

story:
GhostBlade

Do you remember any of these? 

  • Apache Strike.
  • G-Police
  • Warhawk for the PS1
  • The Hornet missions in the Halo games
  • The helicopter parts of Grand Theft Auto
  • The VTOL missions in MechWarrior: Lone Wolf


Enter GhostBlade!

I'm building a game based on what I consider to be the most enjoyable aspects of those games, with modern graphics, modern controller and joystick support, and even Oculus Rift support.

  • This game will take about two months to finish. Most of the groundwork (gameplay, tracking, achievements) is done now, and I intend on spending most of that two months on graphics and audio.
  • Contributors get additional features and perks that you won't get if you just buy the final game. 
  • You're not investing, you're buying a product. I'll finish it anyway, but it will get done a lot faster with your help.

You'll love it.

I'm tired of waiting for a good game like this, so I started building it. I'm not building a game for the money, I'm building the kind of game I would want to play. In addition to getting weekly updated versions of the game, you'll also get...

  • The ability to advertise in a very real way, inside a game. Billboards and buildings. Yes, your company can be in the game itself.
  • Customization options in the game that everyone else won't have
  • Your name in the credits, and my eternal gratitude. Assuming I am immortal.
  • Help with your own Unity games
  • A chance to win one of 12 commemorative GhostBlade 3D printed collectables. 

Challenges

The biggest hurdle games face is not a lack of ideas or talent, it's time. Your contribution now means I can spend time on this, to make sure it gets done quickly. The only parts I'm lacking at this point are:

  • Audio - I have a few sound effects in there, but overall it's quiet. I have a few professional audio editors who will be assisting in fixing this issue, along with one foley artist. 
  • Graphics - These are mostly stand-in graphics. Since the start of this campaign, I have amassed a small army of professional 3D artists who will be assisting me in bringing these up to the highest quality possible. 
  • Slightly different level design. I plan on canyon levels, a few with bodies of water, and a few larger open areas for dogfights. 

Other Ways You Can Help

There are some other ways you can help, if you don't want to contribute. 

  • Help me get the word out and make some noise about GhostBlade.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Play the demos anyway, and leave feedback. Let me know what works for you and what you don't like. 

Unlike a lot of crowdsourced games, I deliver, even if the product wasn't fully funded. You can go play the demo right now, and see if you think it's fun. And if you think I'm on to something, please contribute so I can make sure this game is finished quickly!

Mac Demo: https://s3.amazonaws.com/ghostblade/GhostBladeMac.zip

Windows Demo: https://s3.amazonaws.com/ghostblade/GhostBladeWin.zip

Linux Demo: https://s3.amazonaws.com/ghostblade/GhostBladeLinux.zip

Oculus Rift Windows: https://s3.amazonaws.com/ghostblade/GhostBladeWinRift.zip

Oculus Rift Mac: https://s3.amazonaws.com/ghostblade/GhostBladeMacRift.zip

story:
The world of young adult literature has exploded over the past decade, but one audience segment has been overlooked in this publishing revolution: boys.

The vast majority of YA titles are written specifically for and targeted at girls. And what few books are aimed at boys can languish due to editors who don't know how boys think and marketers who don't know how to properly target boys.

Not only does this mean that a viable market segment is underserved, but it puts us at risk of raising a generation of boys for whom reading for pleasure is unknown.

This is where Rocinante Books comes in.

Meeting our goal will give us the funds needed to acquire, edit, package, publish, and promote six Young Adult novels aimed at boys in our first year. Funds will be used for advances to authors, to commission artists to create covers for our titles, pay for professional developmental and proofreading edits, and the printing and distribution of our initial titles.

This is where Rocinante Books comes in. Meeting our goal will give us the funds needed to acquire, edit, package, publish, and promote six Young Adult novels aimed at boys in our first year. Funds will be used for advances to authors, to commission artists to create covers for our titles, pay for professional developmental and proofreading edits, and the printing and distribution of our initial titles.

story:
Welcome to my book printing campaign. 

My name is Fred Shadian from the Southern Gulf Islands, British Columbia, Canada.
Since 1989 I have been teaching Martial Arts, Firewalking Seminars, Energetic Healing and Meditation Workshops.

My trainings have guided thousands of individuals worldwide, on how to become more aware of their Energetic abilities in their everyday life.


Energetic Questions: Life's Simple Answers.

Energetic Questions is the story of a life changing energetic encounter.

On a stormy snowy winter day in 1997, I was at home meditating in my living room, enjoying the weather elements at play. At the end of my meditation, I began to feel the room getting warmer. I looked out the window and noticed glorious sun rays bursting through the clouds, creating a glistening sparkle of light on the snow. It was breathtakingly beautiful.

I decided that it would be a perfect time to walk up the summit behind the house to do a meditation. The plateau on top of the hill provided all five elements in one location; Earth, Water, Fire, Wind and Space.

The following experience resulted in the writing of a 25 page stream of consciousness booklet, that I shared with my family and friends. The little booklet took a life of its own, I would get letters and phone calls, telling me how the information helped them in their lives.  

Seventeen years later, in late 2014, I began writing every day, with the intent to finish some of the many Energetic book ideas that I  had started years ago. During my writing, I was inspired to revisit the booklet and decided to share the full story of this life changing energetic encounter.

Why you should read this book.

Back in 1997 the original 25 page booklet impacted many that read it.
This expanded 120 page book goes in more depth.
Included is the time tested 21 Day Challenge, which was only taught and shared at my live workshops and one-on-one mentoring sessions.

  • The original 25 page booklet will be included in this printing.
  • Questions about life, you have always wanted to ask.
  • The 1 Minute Breathing exercise that will ground you instantly.
  • 23 Minute Energetic Meditation that will open up your energy field.
  • Energetic Listening, hearing your Divine Soul.
  • 21 Day Challenge that will increase your energetic awareness.
  • It will inspire you to write your own story. 

1000 Books to 1000 People.

The goal is to print 1000 books to share with 1000 people around the world.
I would like to raise $5,000 to make this dream become a reality.
The campaign money will be used for printing, shipping, editing, book cover illustration, layout design, pro book review and marketing. 

Thank You packages for pre-ordering.

7 Thank You packages from $10 to $1000 to support this book campaign. 

* I will personally autograph the book and ship you a copy
* Extra books you can give to your family, friends and associates 
* You will be acknowledged in the book
* Mentoring session via phone or Skype (valued at $200 per 1 hour session)
* 1 Day Energetic Meditation Retreat with Fred Shadian
   ( http://www.fredshadian.com/retreat-center/ )
* 2 Day Energetic Meditation Retreat with Fred Shadian
* 1 Day business / project mentoring with Fred Shadian
(The above Perk Packages do not include accommodation, food or travel)

The retail price of the book will be $20.00 after this campaign. 

Testimonials. 

"Fred Shadian's teachings and insights have a depth and practicality that transcends most other schools of thought I have encountered in the area of personal development, martial arts and peak performance. His latest book is almost poetic in its deep eastern wisdom and also very current for modern day warriors whether you're training for your next sports event or a presentation in the boardroom - these insights can be spark to ignite your life."
- Shane Gibson best selling co-author of Guerrilla Social Media Marketing.

"Fred Shadian has been my friend, my brother, my nutritionist, my martial arts teacher, my mentor and life coach for 2 decades.
Fred you truly are the greatest teacher.
Thank you for all you have taught me." 
- Tricky Nick Marinos
Actor, Stuntman and 3 time Welterweight MMA Champion. 



How can you help with this campaign? 

Please share this page on Twitter, Facebook and via your email. 

Thank You for all your help.
Fred Shadian

story:
Little Sower Samuel .. A Childs Rhyme , with a beautifully illustrated 32 page Picture book by Robert J Costa and Little Steps Publishing.

Dear friends, My name is Robert  Costa and I live on the Northern New South Wales coast in Australia. I'm a keen surfer, gardener and an Electrician by trade.  I have also worked in the sales and advertising industry after a work injury, which left me with less mobility. This injury time however, gave me the chance to fulfil a dream to write books for young children and I'm loving it. My books leave my readers uplifted and happy, with a real feeling of hope and vision. I love the children's faces when the story is over. In the case of Little Sower Sam, the kids can't wait to get out and grow something to share, which means I have succeeded in teaching  kids to live a happy, healthy, kind, sustainable lifestyle.

My campaign is to raise the funds to publish my first book "Little Sower Samuel". He is a young boy with a passion for growing plants from seed. He saves all his good seed from fruits and vegies, puts them in pots and grows them in his backyard. He ends up with so many trees and plants that he decides he must start to share them. This in turn starts an amazing community transformation, as everyone grasps  hold of the sharing food idea and join with him as well. It starts a chain reaction that truly blesses an entire community. Written in Rhyme, kids love the beat and flow of the story, as do adults alike. Loved by teachers , librarians, kids and parents , I'm really pleased I've found a fun way to do a little bit of good.

 I am unable to fund it myself, as injury and time off work have taken their toll on my finances. My manuscript is all finished and approved by my publisher, "Little Steps Publishing" Australia, who called it heart warming.They believe it will sell very well. It also has a recommendation by Virginia Lowe, who has sat as a judge on the children's book council of Australia and my brilliant artist is also ready to go when I am. I will attach one of her drawings from another of her books  in the Gallery to show her beautiful talent.

My contributors will help me achieve a dream, a new career at age 57, which not only blesses me, but I hope, the people I write for. I also wish to give back to the people who help me get to started with signed first edition books.

 

Finance Required to get started

My target is $12,000 US  which when converted to  Australian dollars gives me enough money to :

(a) Pay my artist to do the illustrations.

(b) Pay my publisher "Little Steps Publishing" to do the primary print run of two thousand books which includes sales and distribution.

(c) To set up a quality website for future books, information and distribution. 

(d) Send all my $10 or more  contributors, a signed first edition book if they wish. (post extra).

(e) If I don't reach my entire goal, I will  get the funds from elsewhere and maintain my commitment to my contributors. 

  

The Impact

I truly believe that this book is an important work and will have a valuable impact  on the community at large, as it teaches children the principles of sustainable living, kindness and sharing.  The story encourages a strong sense of community and what can be achieved when people work together for the good of their neighbourhood.

I have spent many years as a community worker, charity worker and Sunday School teacher, so I have a strong understanding of the positive impact achieved when children and elders get together for a good cause. 


Risks & Challenges

  There are no risks in being involved in this project .  I would be very grateful for every  dollar of support. If you commit $10 or more I'll send you a book as well and I have already started other new books,  which also promote vision and hope in children.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute financially, but you really like the idea of this book, please promote it  amongst all your friends and social media contacts.  That would be awesome and very much appreciated. If you can create links to this page that would be great too. I'm not tech savvy so I need all the help I can get. Also, become a seed saver, as It is an important part of your children's global  future to collect , save and re-plant Non hybrid seeds for the generations to come.


~

story:
Wise Pilgrim Guides go to press!

Nearly 10 years after the first web edition went live, and 5 years after the first mobile app for the camino was published, the time has come to go to press with the 1st print edition.

The guides have been rewritten once again (as they are every year), and now contain more practical information than they ever have; for the first time including more specific information for pilgrims who are looking for albergues that offer group dinners and vegetarian options. 

The First Print Edition of the Camino Francés

For the first time in print, the guidebooks will include:

  • A comprehensive accommodation directory.  Over 900 properties, including all albergues, hotels, paradors, casa rurales, pensions, and camp sites. For albergues you will know: how many beds (including private rooms) the albergue has and how much they cost, phone number, months (and hours) open,  and whether the albergue accepts non-pilgrims or reservations.  You will also know whether they have a bar/restaurant, a kitchen for your use, whether they serve a group dinner, have vegetarian options, wifi, laundry facilities, or bicycle storage.
  • City by city information. Navigation tips and cautions, historical references, a list of available service (pharmacies, restaurants, atms, that kind of stuff) and dates for local fiestas.
  • Maps, and lots of them.  Over 100 city maps, giving you a quick visual reference for where to find the nearest grocery, albergue, pharmacy, atm, and other bits.  Plus 40 area maps to help you plan the day(s) ahead.
  • Elevation profile.  A quick reference to get a handle on just how high and steep those ascents and descents are. Or to see that the Meseta isn’t so flat after all.
  • Quick booking links.  For cities where accommodation is available on booking.com, a QR code is included (in an appendix) to help you get the task done with the least amount of clicking possible.
  • Lightweight.  Every effort has been made to trim un-necessary filler.  The book size is 12cm x 17cm, and approximately 200 pages.

Created Responsibly

The guidebook will be produced to be climate neutral. It will be printed on recycled paper (as I do not want to support cutting more trees down than necessary) with non-toxic colors and under fair labour conditions. It will be printed in the EU.

So what are the risks?

The risks for this fundraiser are zero.  Basically, the book is all set.  Everything is written, photos placed, and 90% of the maps have been created; and when the remainder are done the book will go to press regardless of whether the goal has been reached.  

If it is all done, why use IndieGoGo?

I have chosen to use IndieGoGo because it is the easiest and fastest way to take pre-orders of the book, allowing me to focus on the next two projects: The Camino del Norte, and The Camino Portugues, which will also print this year. Eventually, they will all be available through other online retailers and through a dedicated website.

Other ways you can help

If you already have a guidebook, you probably don’t need another one.  But you can still help by sharing this link with  future pilgrims, by talking about it in your local pilgrim groups, and by sharing the link in you forum of choice.  JuJu in any form is appreciated.

And lastly, a bit about me.

My name is Michael and I've been a pilgrim since I started walking from Roncesvalles one very hot July afternoon in 2003.  Since then I have walked one route or another every year, taking notes and collecting memories and stamps.  Early on I created the wisepilgrim.com website to collect and share knowledge, and 5 years ago I turned that knowledge into the first camino app. Though born in the USA, early trips as a child to my mom's native Spain left an impression.  As an adult (questionably so) I have recently migrated the family from our home in Iceland to the green hills of Galicia.  From the countryside outside of Santiago I hatch crazy plans, like this one.

A quick thank you to all of the pilgrims throughout the past 5 years that have enthusiastically supported the apps, they have kept the dream alive and generated the passion to go to press.
